name: WoodpeckerSounds
0:
”Alexa open Woodpecker Sounds”
”Alexa ask Woodpecker Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: woodpecker sounds
des:
Immerse yourself in the heart of a dense forest with the rhythmic pecking of woodpeckers. This skill features the distinctive sounds of woodpeckers at work, accompanied by the subtle background noise of forest life, creating a tranquil and rustic atmosphere.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Woodpecker Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
